author: POLITICO Pro Staff
title: Trump administration recommends Americans wear cloth masks amid pandemic
description: The president added that the CDC did not recommend that the public use "medical grade or surgical grade masks," which should be saved for medical workers.
content:
The president added that the CDC did not recommend that the public use "medical grade or surgical grade masks," which should be saved for medical workers.
